pct_pop_cable_fiber_dsl:perc_w_cable_fib.short_name: Population with cable, fiber optic, or DSL
pct_pop_cable_fiber_dsl:perc_w_cable_fib.long_name: Percent of population with a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
pct_pop_cable_fiber_dsl:perc_w_cable_fib.short_description: Percent of population self-reported to have a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
pct_pop_cable_fiber_dsl:perc_w_cable_fib.long_description: Percent of population self-reported to have a high speed internet service. A high speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
pct_pop_cable_fiber_dsl:perc_w_cable_fib.statement: {value} of the population in {features.name} has a cable fiber or DSL internet connection
